posts.post_title: 2 OJs for sale  including a Brown's Champs Sold!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: robert a
2 For sale (both sold) Thanks.

The hudson is in an SGC 30 holder.  $350
The herr is raw and has been rebacked as far as I can tell.  $60

$400 takes em both.
